const malbec = {
  grape: ['Malbec'],
  style: 'Red',
  drinkingTemperature: 'Room Temperature',
  countries: ['Argentina', 'France', 'Chile', 'USA', 'South Africa', 'Australia', 'Italy'],
  dominantFlavors: ['Plum', 'Blueberry', 'Vanilla', 'Tabacco', 'Cocoa'],
  possibleFlavors: {
    fruits: ['Cherry', 'Black Raspberry'],
    dryFruits: ['Raisin', 'Prune'],
    florals: ['Wild Iris'],
    herbs: ['Sage', 'Yerba Mate'],
    spices: ['Cinnamon', 'Baking Spices', 'Milk Chocolate'],
    earthFlavors: ['Clay Pot'],
    others: []
  }
}

const pinotNoir = {
  grape: ['Pinot Noir', 'Spätbugunder'],
  style: 'Red',

    { earthFlavors: ['Truffle', 'Potting Soil', 'Dried Leaves', 'Tabacco', 'Gun Smoke', 'Cocoa'] },
    { others: ['Cream', 'Toasted Bread'] }
  ]
}

    { earthFlavors: ['Clay Pot', 'New Leather', 'Potting Soil'] },

}

    { spices: ['Coffee', 'Mocha', 'Cocoa Nib', 'Vanilla', 'Nutmeg', 'Toffee', '', 'Pipe Tabacco'] },
    { earthFlavors: ['Wet Gravel', 'Graphite', 'Pencil Lead', 'Clay Dust', 'Charcoal'] },

  ] 
}

const syrah = {
  grape: ['Syrah'],
